Name: Down the Hill
About the game: Go down the hill along the cells, changing the direction of movement, avoiding holes and trees and gain points. Use bonuses on cells, such as a mark or a cube. The mark will launch you through one cell, and the cube will fill the nearest holes. Over time, the pace of the game accelerates and you have to try not to lose.
